1.[... ...] bin Haʿān [... ... ... ...] 2.[...] (they) have acquired and built and laid the foundations and finished off the water-channel of Rawi-[yum] 3.[... ... ...] Gurrat, the palm-grove of [... ... ...] 4.[... ...] this water-channel of [... ...] and (of the lineage of) [... ...] 5.the boundaries [... ...] Gurrat and [Gu]rrat. (By) [...] and [...]
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Sharaḥʿathat] bin Haʿān [of the lineage of Ḥalḥilum and his sons of the lineage of Ḥa-] 2.[lḥilum] have acquired and built and laid the foundations and finished off the water-channel of Rawi-[yum] 3.[as an irrigation scheme for their palm-grove of] Gurrat, (i.e.) the palm-grove of the lineage of Ḥa[lḥilum. And] 4.[may] this water-channel of [Dhū-Raymān] and of the lineage of [Ḥalḥilum, between] 5.the boundaries [of the two palm-groves of] Gurrat (I) and [Gu]rrat (II), [not be destroyed]. By [ʿAthtar] and [by ʾĪlmuquh].

as an irrigation scheme for their palm-grove of Gurrat, i.e. the palm-grove of the lineage of Ḥalḥilum. And

the boundaries of the two palm-groves of Gurrat I and Gurrat II, not be destroyed. By ʿAthtar and by ʾĪlmuquh.
